title: Server transfers still not available?
body: Server transfers were supposed to be ready once patch 8.2 went live, but they are still not available. Is there a server that hasn't updated to patch 8.2 yet or is there another reason why it isn't available? Any info helps!

replies.body: They wanted to test it out a bit before rushing it into action, juuuuust in case something went wrong again. It's now being tested, and should be launched shortly!
